channel.title: Help me keep this kid banned
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm co owning a server. This kid keeps coming in and hacking, turning into a mine cart and spawning items. I ip ban him but he gets around with changing his ip. Is there anyway I can keep this kid ip banned? Like a code that blocks somehow all proxies?

item.title: Help me keep this kid banned
item.dc:creator: @bbwf bbwf
item.description:
@bbwf wrote:

I’ve figured it out. He was a really nice guy I sat down and talked to him about him hacking and he told me what packets to block and what steps to take to prevent all of this… Idk whether or not to trust him but he sounded legit.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me keep this kid banned

item.title: Help me keep this kid banned
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

i think the real question is, how does he keep abusing your command system?

Read full topic
